description: It is an assassination technique to ask the attendance from an elegant appearance, turn to counterattack. In addition to getting a bonus to avoid avoiding, you can step on a raid by stepping in avoidance.

static_buffs.name: A silent appearance
static_buffs.description: By keeping waiting you get +2 bonus on avoidance.

onmove_buffs.name: Raid
onmove_buffs.description: Although it receives a penalty for avoidance by moving it, you get a bonus to hit and damage according to your senses.

ondodge_buffs.name: Counterattack
ondodge_buffs.description: We avoided attacks with minimal movement. It is an opportunity of counterattack.
